body: i dont dislike the Alisa route but i wish for my best girl Emma route

Where's my Renne doujin?
But well this is good.
But also POGGERS FOR COLD STEEL HENTAI BROTHERS

@stenone while I agree Cold Steel doesn’t have a canon Waifu as of now, Alisa and Emma are very clearly pushed very hard as the closest thing to a canon girl for Rean. The former because she has the strongest heroine traits, and the latter for plot spoilers.

There’s a lot of god tier waifus in Trails but they only draw the most uninteresting/boring one. Why Aidios? 

People buying Falcom horrible marketing towards her make me sad. Rean others love interest >>>

Well I'm simp Laura but Alisa is also good. By the way there also prequal called "Assemble 1" but it is SFW doujinshi. 
If someone would like to read that just search this title with author name, you will find it.

Propping your waifu or  even your ship up is fine, but there IS no canon OTP for this series, so don't expect anyone to give a damn about your opinion on it outside of correctly rejecting it for being abusive to any other opinion.
im still in love with emma tho lol so rean can have her and dont touch my emma or juna fie or musse haha
Alisa is best girl, haters can seethe all they want because their trash taste will never be canon to Falcom.

I reject this route! Rean can have a harem ending, he can end up marrying the cutest princess, he can have a romance with one of his students, or he can end up single as a free and untethered hero. But I won't accept an ending with Alisa!
Rare and nice seeing kiseki doujins
